title: Stephen Miller Mails "Race-Baiting Misinformation" to Asian American Voters
description:
Asian American Democrats in Pennsylvania are combating a flood of misleading ads from former Trump administration officials ahead of the midterms.

The post Stephen Miller Mails “Race-Baiting Misinformation” to Asian American Voters appeared first on The Intercept.

title: GOP Candidate Playing Up Veteran Status Finds Loophole for His Claim
description:
Veterans organizations are taking sides in the race between Colin Schmitt and Democrat Pat Ryan. But their resumes are very different.

The post GOP Candidate Playing Up Veteran Status Finds Loophole for His Claim appeared first on The Intercept.

title: An Uber Millionaire Wants You to Vote on the Internet — Despite the Inherent Vulnerabilities
description:
Bradley Tusk’s Mobile Voting has already conducted 21 online voting pilots in seven states, but the technology for doing it securely doesn’t exist.

The post An Uber Millionaire Wants You to Vote on the Internet — Despite the Inherent Vulnerabilities appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Top Fed Official: Fed Will “Keep At This” Until Your Savings Accounts Are Drained
description:
Kansas City Fed President Esther George should be celebrated for being honest about how the Federal Reserve works.

The post Top Fed Official: Fed Will “Keep At This” Until Your Savings Accounts Are Drained appeared first on The Intercept.

title: For Abortion Rights, Could Kentucky Be the Next Kansas?
description:
A ballot measure in the state could pave the way for a total abortion ban.

The post For Abortion Rights, Could Kentucky Be the Next Kansas? appeared first on The Intercept.
